ArgonTest.Name: Box type in Ar namespace with import
ArgonTest.InputSource:
namespace Ar
import Ar._
trait ValueBox(T: type) <: Object public abstract def _.value: T end
constructor ValueBoxInstance(T: type)(value: T): ValueBox T public override def _.value: T = value end

import Ar._
proc main(): Unit do val box = ValueBoxInstance String 'Hello World' puts box.value end
